dict.acceptation: 事件；（讨论、考虑等的）问题；重要性；物质；
要紧，重要；化脓；有重大影响；有重要性；

sent.orig: Airis matter. Water is matter. Soil is matter.
sent.trans: 空气是物质，水是物质，土壤是物质。

sent.orig: We should take a matter-of-fact attitude towards the matter.
sent.trans: 对这个问题，我们应当有求实精神。

sent.orig: Cerebellar white-matter was severely involved, but the grey-matter nucleus were not involved.
sent.trans: 以小脑半球白质受累最为严重，但其灰质核团未见受累。

sent.orig: The clear separation of matter and gas clouds is considered direct evidence that matter exists.
sent.trans: 这种暗物质和辉光云气完全分离的例子，被视为是暗物质存在的直接证据。

sent.orig: No matter if you're fast, no matter if you're slow, oh oh.
sent.trans: 不管你多快不管你多慢噢噢。
